content: I did a quick skim through the documentation looking for this, but didn't find it. So apologies if it's there. Is there a way to deploy default preferences to multiple users? (Linux) are the app preferences stored in a user location, inside the app image, or?
I think there was some work on this feature, though I don't know the status. @desktop fyi.
We certainly would like to build this soon; if you're up for beta testing, that could be helpful as the desktop team develops it.
(I think we at least had a design for how to do the storage)
